Levels.anat: Magnetic Resonance Imaging, anatomy/structural imaging data
Levels.dwi: Magnetic Resonance Imaging, diffusion-weighted imaging data
Levels.func: Magnetic Resonance Imaging, task/funcional imaging data

task.Description: Set of structured activities performed by the participant

Levels.fixation: visualizing the fixation cross of different colors
Levels.categorization: visual classification of stimuli into different categories

misc_comments.Description: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
